        public Mother findSpecific(java.lang.String id)

      • getAppointments

        public java.util.Vector<Appointment> getAppointments(java.lang.String month,
                                                     Mother mother)
        A method to issue a query to get all the items from the Appointments table in the database in a given month
        Parameters:
        month - The month to use to retrieve appointments from the database
        mother - The mother whose appointments to retrieve
        Returns:
        A vector containing appointments from the query
